title: Chinese rocket debris falls over Indian Ocean
author: CBS News
description:
A huge piece of space junk made an uncontrolled re-entry back into Earth's atmosphere Saturday night. The remnants of a Chinese rocket re-entered the atmosphere and crashed into the Indian Ocean north of the Maldives. CBS News' Danya Bacchus reports. Read more here: https://cbsn.ws/2Q3MnnD

CBSN is CBS News’ 24/7 digital streaming news service featuring live, anchored coverage available for free across all platforms. Launched in November 2014, the service is a premier destination for breaking news and original storytelling from the deep bench of CBS News correspondents and reporters. CBSN features the top stories of the day as well as deep dives into key issues facing the nation and the world. CBSN has also expanded to launch local news streaming services in major markets across the country. CBSN is currently available on CBSNews.com and the CBS News app across more than 20 platforms, as well as the Paramount+ subscription service.

localize.description:
土曜日の夜、巨大な宇宙ゴミが制御不能な状態で地球の大気圏に再突入しました。中国製ロケットの残骸は大気圏に再突入し、モルディブの北にあるインド洋に墜落した。CBS ニュースの Danya Bacchus がレポートします。続きはこちら： https://cbsn.ws/2Q3MnnD

localize.title: 中国製ロケットの残骸がインド洋上に落下

localize.description:
一块巨大的太空垃圾星期六晚上不受控制地重新进入地球大气层。一枚中国火箭的残骸重新进入大气层，在马尔代夫以北的印度洋上坠毁。CBS新闻的Danya Bacchus报道。在此阅读更多内容：https://cbsn.ws/2Q3MnnD
